title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.33 - Bromotoluene, alpha (benzyl bromide)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.33 - Bromotoluene, alpha (benzyl bromide)

State Regulations

Bromotoluene, alpha (benzyl bromide) is restricted to a
maximum quantity per vehicle of 60 gallons or 1000 pounds gross weight
provided, however, the contents of each inside glass container is not more than
five pints. There are no restrictions on the transport of empty containers
which last contained bromotoluene, alpha (benzyl bromide) provided the
accompanying shipping papers show them to be empty. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21

1211.33

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
